mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LA_LOAN_ACCOUNT ( id, inHisTable, died, factLoanDate, factOutLoanAmount, lastLockDate, lastRepayDate, lastUpdateDate, lastRepayAmount, loanAmount, loanAccountType, nextRepayDate, nextDeductDate, nextOverdueCheckDate, nextSettleInterestDate, overRepayAmount, paidPeriod, time, timeUnitType, vcid, afterDelayDays, firstRepayDate, graceDays, legalProcedure, repayWay, totalPeriod, writeOff, writeOffDate, writeOffAmount, writeOffReason, writeOffRepayAmount, beforeDelayDays, clientId, clientName, clientAccountId, clientIdCardType, clientIdCardNumber, closed, createDate, creditInfoId, creditInfoVersion, expiryDate, locked, revokeDate, revokeReason, settle, settleDate, settleSL, settleRepayDate, settleCurrentPeriod, settleInterestStatus, settleSLDate, settleRepayDatePeriod, settleSLRepayDate, settleSLRepayDatePeriod, sourceLoanAccountId, sourceLastTradingRecordId, accountStatus, currentPeriod, currentPeriodExpireDate, monthlyRepayDay, monthlyRepayAmount, overdue, overdueSum, overdueDate, overdueAmount, revoked, category, contractId, contractNumber, districtId, interestDate, effectiveDate, outsource, outsourceAmount, outsourceHappend, outsourcePercentage, outsourceAssignRecordId, principalBalance, principalBalanceIrr, collectionStatus, organizationId ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inHisTable}, #{died}, #{factLoanDate}, #{factOutLoanAmount}, #{lastLockDate}, #{lastRepayDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastRepayAmount}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanAccountType}, #{nextRepayDate}, #{nextDeductDate}, #{nextOverdueCheckDate}, #{nextSettleInterestDate}, #{overRepayAmount}, #{paidPeriod}, #{time}, #{timeUnitType}, #{vcid}, #{afterDelayDays}, #{firstRepayDate}, #{graceDays}, #{legalProcedure}, #{repayWay}, #{totalPeriod}, #{writeOff}, #{writeOffDate}, #{writeOffAmount}, #{writeOffReason}, #{writeOffRepayAmount}, #{beforeDelayDays}, #{clientId}, #{clientName}, #{clientAccountId}, #{clientIdCardType}, #{clientIdCardNumber}, #{closed}, #{createDate}, #{creditInfoId}, #{creditInfoVersion}, #{expiryDate}, #{locked}, #{revokeDate}, #{revokeReason}, #{settle}, #{settleDate}, #{settleSL}, #{settleRepayDate}, #{settleCurrentPeriod}, #{settleInterestStatus}, #{settleSLDate}, #{settleRepayDatePeriod}, #{settleSLRepayDate}, #{settleSLRepayDatePeriod}, #{sourceLoanAccountId}, #{sourceLastTradingRecordId}, #{accountStatus}, #{currentPeriod}, #{currentPeriodExpireDate}, #{monthlyRepayDay}, #{monthlyRepayAmount}, #{overdue}, #{overdueSum}, #{overdueDate}, #{overdueAmount}, #{revoked}, #{category}, #{contractId}, #{contractNumber}, #{district.id}, #{interestDate}, #{effectiveDate}, #{outsource}, #{outsourceAmount}, #{outsourceHappend}, #{outsourcePercentage}, #{outsourceAssignRecordId}, #{principalBalance}, #{principalBalanceIrr}, #{collectionStatus}, #{organizationId} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM LA_LOAN_ACCOUNT WHERE
AND id = #{id}
